actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Federal Reserve System, Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation, Federal Home Loan Bank Board, Comptroller of the Currency, Treasury Department.
Committee on Banking received executive comment from Comptroller of the Currency.
Committee on Banking received executive comment from Federal Home Loan Bank Board.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize interstate banking among certain states.

summary.text: Interstate Banking Act of 1983 - Amends specified Federal banking laws to: (1) permit a bank to operate out-of-State if the foreign State's statutory law specifically grants such authority; and (2) provide that in considering bank acquisitions, mergers, or reorganizations effect shall be given to any State laws authorizing such activities by out-of-State banks.

titles.title: A bill to authorize interstate banking among certain states.
